title: Effects of Glossolalia
text: Some Christians speak in tongues. This study uses data from the Pew Research Center 2014 Religious Landscape Study to examine the effect of glossolalia on a variety of religious, social, and political attitudes and behavior.

title: Background
text:
Who speaks in tongues? Which traditions? Which demographics?
Correlates of glossolalia. What religious variables are most predictive of glossolalia? Is there something special about speaking in tongues?
Effects of glossolalia on attitudes, psychology well-being?

title: Methods
text: The data for this project come from the 2014 Religious Landscape Study, by the Pew Research Center.
